original_text: Nobody will be able to use any of your stones as a foundation for a new building. You will remain as empty as a desert for ever.’ That is what the Lord says. Nobody will be able to use any of your stones as a foundation for a new building. You will remain as empty as a desert for ever.’ That is what the Lord says. Nobody will be able to use any of your stones
korean_text: 사람이 네게서 집 모퉁잇돌이나 기촛돌을 취하지 아니할 것이요 너는 영원히 황무지가 될 것이니라 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: Nobody will be able to use any of your stones
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 당신의 돌들을 사용할 수 없을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: as a foundation for a new building
You will remain as empty as a desert
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 광야처럼 텅 빈 상태로 남을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: That is what the Lord says
Nobody will be able to use any of your stones
